activities: We acquire, hold and process employee personal data for the performance and exercise of our responsibilities and rights as employers;  complying with and exercising our rights under relevant employment laws and related litigation; and the general administration of our employer/employee relationships.

recoursemech: Cummins elects to satisfy the requirements in points (a) and (c) of the Safe Harbor Enforcement Principles by committing to cooperate with the EU Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner or their authorized representatives in the investigation and resolution of complaints brought under the Safe Harbor and will comply with any advice given.
